data.slogan: clean and extract metadata from text
data.description: `textpipe` is a Python package for converting raw text in to clean, readable text and extracting metadata from that text. Its functionalities include transforming raw text into readable text by removing HTML tags and extracting metadata such as the number of words and named entities from the text.
data.author: Textpipe Contributors
